ROOT.GetStationCoordinate: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,s.PG_ID as GRID_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE,s.connective_pg_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,s.pg_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s
ROOT.GetStationCoordinateById: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s WHERE s.ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s WHERE s.ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s WHERE s.ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,3002 as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B s WHERE s.ID={0}
ROOT.GetEffectStation: SELECT S.ID,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,S.NAME,P.NAME AS GRIDNAME,M.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS MANAGENAME FROM {0} JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B S ON {1} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON S.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON S.PG_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_COMPANY_B M ON S.MANAGE_DEPT_ID=M.ID WHERE {2} ORDER BY LENGTH(V.NAME) DESC, V.NAME DESC,S.NAME
ROOT.GetEffectPlant: SELECT S.ID,T.NAME AS TYPENAME,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,S.NAME,P.NAME AS GRIDNAME FROM {0} JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B S ON {1} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON S.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON S.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_PLANTSTATIONTYPE T ON S.PLANT_TYPE=T.CODE WHERE {2} ORDER BY LENGTH(V.NAME) DESC, V.NAME DESC,S.NAME
ROOT.GetLineInfo: SELECT {0} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B WHERE {1} UNION ALL SELECT {0} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE {1}
